summary.span: 显示一个月的日历，用户能够用它选择日期并移到下一个月或上个月。

span.span: Displays a single-month calendar that enables the user to select dates and move to the next or previous month.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [简介Introduction](#Introduction) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 简介Introduction 使用 控件在网页上显示单个月的日历。Use the control to display a single month of a calendar on a Web page. 控件允许您选择日期并移到下一个月或上个月。The control allows you to select dates and move to the next or previous month. 控件支持 命名空间中的所有类型 。The control supports all the types in the namespace. 除了公历，这还包括使用不同年份和月份系统的日历，如回历。Apart from the Gregorian calendar, this also includes calendars that use different year and month systems, such as the Hijri calendar. 您可以指定控件是否 允许您通过设置属性来选择单个日、每周或整月 。You can specify whether the control allows you to select a single day, week, or entire month by setting the property. 默认情况下，该控件显示每月的几天、一周中的几天、一周中各天的标题、一个带有月份名称和年份的标题、用于选择月份中各天的链接以及用于移动到下个月和上个月的链接。By default, the control displays the days of the month, day headings for the days of the week, a title with the month name and year, links for selecting individual days of the month, and links for moving to the next and previous month. 您可以通过设置控件的不同部分的属性来自定义控件的外观 。You can customize the appearance of the control by setting the properties that control the style for different parts of the control. 下表列出了属性，这些属性指定控件的不同部分的样式。The following table lists the properties that specify the style for the different parts of the control. |属性Property|说明Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||指定显示周中各天的部分的样式。Specifies the style for the section that displays the days of the week.| ||指定所显示月份中日期的样式。Specifies the style for the dates in the displayed month.| ||指定标题部分中导航控件的样式。Specifies the style for the navigation controls in the title section.| ||指定不在当前显示的月份中的日期的样式。Specifies the style for the dates that are not in the currently displayed month.| ||为日历上的选定日期指定样式。Specifies the style for the selected dates on the calendar.| ||指定周和月份日期选择列的样式。Specifies the style for the week and month date-selection column.| ||指定标题部分的样式。Specifies the style for the title section.| ||指定今天日期的样式。Specifies the style for today's date.| ||指定周末日期的样式。Specifies the style for the weekend dates.| 还可以显示或隐藏控件的不同部分。You can also show or hide different parts of the control. 下表列出了属性，这些属性控制要显示或隐藏的部分。The following table lists the properties that control which parts are shown or hidden. |属性Property|说明Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||显示或隐藏显示周中各天的部分。Shows or hides the section that displays the days of the week.| ||显示或隐藏月份中各天之间的网格线。Shows or hides the gridlines between the days of the month.| ||显示或隐藏下个月或上个月的导航控件。Shows or hides the navigation controls to the next or previous month.| ||显示或隐藏标题部分。Shows or hides the title section.| 尽管控件不支持绑定到数据源 ，但你可以修改各个日期单元的内容和格式设置。Although binding to a data source is not supported for the control, you can modify the content and formatting of the individual date cells. 在 控件显示在网页上之前，它将创建并汇编构成控件的组件。Before the control is displayed on the Web page, it creates and assembles the components that make up the control. 当创建控件中的每个日期单元格时，将引发事件 。The event is raised when each date cell in the control is created. 可以通过在事件的事件处理程序中提供代码来控制日期单元格的内容和格式设置 。You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell as it is created by providing code in the event handler for the event. 有关自定义日期单元内容的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on customizing the contents of a date cell, see . > [!NOTE] > 该 控件会 (JScript、JavaScript) 呈现给客户端浏览器的 ECMAScript。The control renders ECMAScript (JScript, JavaScript) to the client browser. 为了使此控件正常运行，客户端浏览器必须启用 ECMAScript。The client browser must have ECMAScript enabled for this control to function properly. 有关客户端脚本的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 网页中的客户端脚本](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/3hc29e2a(v=vs.100))。For more information on client script, see [Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/3hc29e2a(v=vs.100)). ## 可访问性Accessibility 默认情况下，为此控件呈现的标记可能不符合辅助功能标准。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards. 有关此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140))。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140)). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                  ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在网页上创建控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control on a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Calendar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Calendar Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Calendar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Calendar Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示 在编辑控件显示的一列时使用的控件 。The following example shows a control used when editing one of the columns displayed by a control. 控件通过方法绑定到数据源 `Bind` 。The control is bound to the data source with the `Bind` method. `Eval`方法用于绑定控件显示的日期值 。The `Eval` method is used to bind the date value that is displayed by the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewConcepts#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewConcepts/CS/gridviewcustomcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewConcepts#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewConcepts/VB/gridviewcustomvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表标题用于说明一至三个句子中表的性质。A table caption is used to describe the nature of the table in one to three sentences. 使用 属性将标题与日历对齐。Use the property to align the caption with the calendar. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来显示控件的标题 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display a caption for a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CalendarCaption#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarCaption/CS/calendarcaptioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CalendarCaption#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarCaption/VB/calendarcaptionvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定标题相对于控件的显示位置 。This property determines where the caption appears in relation to the control. 默认值为 ，这允许浏览器确定对齐标题的位置。The default value is , which lets the browser determine where to align the caption. 下表说明了 值与标题外观之间的关系。The following table explains the relationship between the value and the appearance of the caption. | 值 value|外观Appearance| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------| |`Bottom`|标题显示在日历底部，文本居中。The caption appears at the bottom of the calendar, with the text centered.| |`Left`|标题显示在日历顶部，文本左对齐。The caption appears at the top of the calendar, with the text left-aligned.| |`NotSet`|标题对齐方式未设置，由浏览器决定。The caption alignment is not set and is determined by the browser.| |`Right`|标题显示在日历顶部，文本右对齐。The caption appears at the top of the calendar, with the text right-aligned.| |`Top`|标题显示在日历顶部，文本居中。The caption appears at the top of the calendar with the text centered.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性对齐控件的标题 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to align a caption for a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可控制单元格内容和单元格边框之间的间距。Use this property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. 指定的填充量将添加到单元格的四个边。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of a cell. 无法指定单个单元大小。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified. > [!NOTE] > 如果将此属性设置为，则 `-1` 表示未在呈现的表中设置此属性。Setting this property to `-1` indicates that this property is not set in the rendered table. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来用5个像素填充每个单元格。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to pad each cell with 5 pixels. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定一周中各天的名称格式。Use the property to specify the name format for the days of the week. 此属性设置为一个 枚举值。This property is set with one of the enumeration values. 您可以指定一周中的某天是显示为全名、简短 (缩写) 名称、一天的第一个字母还是当天的前两个字母。You can specify whether the days of the week are displayed as the full name, short (abbreviated) name, first letter of the day, or first two letters of the day. 仅当属性设置为时，此属性才适用 `true` 。This property applies only if the property is set to `true`. 日期名称基于服务器的本地设置。The day names are based on the server's local settings. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定一周中的某天显示为完整。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that days of the week are displayed in full. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在控件层次结构中为控件创建每日时，将引发此事件 。This event is raised when each day is created in the control hierarchy for the control. 尽管控件不支持数据绑定，但也可以 修改各个日期单元的内容和格式设置。Although data binding is not supported for the control, it is possible to modify the content and formatting of the individual date cells. 在 控件显示在网页上之前，它将创建并汇编构成控件的组件。Before the control is displayed on the Web page, it creates and assembles the components that make up the control. 当创建控件中的每个日期单元格时，将引发事件 。The event is raised when each date cell in the control is created. 可以通过在事件的事件处理程序中提供代码来控制日期单元格的内容和格式设置 。You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell when it is created by providing code in the event handler for the event. 有关自定义日期单元内容的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on customizing the contents of a date cell, see . > [!NOTE] > 由于在 呈现控件时引发事件 ，因此无法添加也可能引发事件的控件，例如 。Because the event is raised while the control is being rendered, you cannot add a control that can also raise an event, such as . 只能添加静态控件，例如 、、 和 。You can only add static controls, such as , , , and . 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件指定和编写处理程序的代码， 以使背景色在显示的月份中的日期为黄色。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to make the background color yellow for the days in the displayed month. 它还演示了如何通过将 控件添加到单元格来自定义单元格的内容。It also demonstrates how to customize the contents of a cell by adding a control to the cell. remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管控件不支持数据绑定，但也可以 修改各个日期单元的内容和格式设置。Although data binding is not supported for the control, it is possible to modify the content and formatting of the individual date cells. 在 控件显示在网页上之前，它将创建并汇编构成控件的组件。Before the control is displayed on the Web page, it creates and assembles the components that make up the control. 当创建控件中的每个日期单元格时，将引发事件 。The event is raised when each date cell in the control is created. 可以通过在事件的事件处理程序中提供代码来控制日期单元格的内容和格式设置 。You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell when it is created by providing code in the event handler for the event. 事件处理程序接收 包含事件数据的对象。The event handler receives a object that contains event data. 对象包含两个属性，可用于以编程方式控制日期单元格的格式。The object contains two properties that you can use to programmatically control the format of the date cell. 属性表示正在呈现的单元格，而 属性表示要在单元格中呈现的日期。The property represents the cell being rendered, while the property represents the date to render in the cell. 还可以通过将控件动态添加到属性的集合来自定义单元格的内容 。You can also customize the contents of a cell by dynamically adding controls to the collection of the property. > [!NOTE] > 由于在 呈现控件时引发事件 ，因此无法添加也可能引发事件的控件，例如 。Because the event is raised while the control is being rendered, you cannot add a control that can also raise an event, such as . 只能添加静态控件，例如 、、 和 。You can only add static controls, such as , , , and . 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件指定和编写处理程序的代码， 以使背景色在显示的月份中的日期为黄色。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to make the background color yellow for the days in the displayed month. 它还演示了如何通过将 控件添加到单元格来自定义单元格的内容。It also demonstrates how to customize the contents of a cell by adding a control to the cell. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定控件上的所选日期 。Use the property to determine the selected date on the control. 属性和 集合密切相关。The property and the collection are closely related. 当 属性设置为时 `CalendarSelectionMode.Day` ，为仅允许单个日期选择的模式， `SelectedDates[0]` 具有相同的值，并且 `SelectedDates.Count` 等于1。When the property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.Day`, a mode that allows only a single date selection, and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value and `SelectedDates.Count` equals 1. 当 属性设置为或时 `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek` `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth` ，允许多个日期选择的模式 和 `SelectedDates[0]` 具有相同的值。When the property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek` or `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`, modes that allows multiple date selections, and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value. 使用对象来设置属性 。The property is set using a object. 当用户选择控件上的日期时 ，将 引发事件。When the user selects a date on the control, the event is raised. 属性更新为所选日期。The property is updated to the selected date. 集合还会更新为仅包含此日期。The collection is also updated to contain just this date. > [!NOTE] > 在 引发事件之前，将更新属性和集合 。Both the property and the collection are updated before the event is raised. 您可以通过使用 事件处理程序手动设置属性来覆盖日期选择 。You can override the date selection by using the event handler to manually set the property. 以编程方式设置此属性时，不会引发事件。The event does not get raised when this property is programmatically set. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来确定控件上的所选日期 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the selected date on the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 集合确定控件上当前选定的日期 。Use the collection to determine the currently selected dates on the control. 属性和 集合密切相关。The property and the collection are closely related. 当 属性设置为时 `CalendarSelectionMode.Day` ，为仅允许单个日期选择的模式， `SelectedDates[0]` 具有相同的值，并且 `SelectedDates.Count` 等于1。When the property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.Day`, a mode that allows only a single date selection, and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value and `SelectedDates.Count` equals 1. 当 属性设置为或时 `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek` `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth` ，允许多个日期选择的模式 和 `SelectedDates[0]` 具有相同的值。When the property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek` or `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`, modes that allows multiple date selections, and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value. 属性存储对象的集合 。The property stores a collection of objects. 当用户在控件上选择一周或每月时 ，将 引发事件。When the user selects a week or month on the control, the event is raised. 选定的日期将添加到 集合中，并替换以前的内容。The selected dates are added to the collection, replacing the previous contents. 日期范围按日期进行升序排序。The range of dates are sorted in ascending order by date. 还会更新属性以包含集合中的第一个日期 。The property is also updated to contain the first date in the collection. 你还可以使用该 集合以编程方式选择控件上的日期 。You can also use the collection to programmatically select dates on the control. 使用 、 、 和 方法以编程方式操作集合中的选定日期 。Use the , , , and methods to programmatically manipulate the selected dates in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 在 引发事件之前，将更新属性和集合 。Both the property and the collection are updated before the event is raised. 您可以通过使用 事件处理程序手动设置集合来覆盖日期选择 。You can override the date selection by using the event handler to manually set the collection. 如果以编程方式设置此集合，则不会引发事件。The event is not raised when this collection is programmatically set. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 集合确定控件上的选定日期 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to determine the selected dates on the control.
